alert.note: Alert for Berks; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 7:55AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT EAST CENTRAL BERKS...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...WESTERN BUCKS AND NORTH CENTRAL CHESTER COUNTIES... At 754 AM EST, a snow squall was located near Bechtelsville, or 14 miles east of Reading, moving southeast at 20 mph. Wind gusts up to 35 mph along with visibilities less than 1 mile are possible with this squall. Locations impacted include... Pottstown, Royersford, Trappe, East Greenville, Schwenksville, Bally, Bechtelsville, Green Lane, Geryville, Spring Mount, Gilbertsville, Stowe, Telford, Boyertown, Pennsburg, Spring City, Red Hill, Harleysville, Pottsgrove and Sanatoga. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 34 and 40. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Berks; Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
